rows.text_1_facilitator:
**Welcome to your first lesson**

Today's topic is about self-care. 

We often forget to take care of ourselves, but it's really important, especially if you are a parent!

When you reduce stress and treat yourselves kindly, it helps both you and your children.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
**Welcome to your first lesson**

Today's topic is about self-care. 

We often forget to take care of ourselves, but it's really important, especially if you are a parent!

When you reduce stress and treat yourselves kindly, it helps both you and your children.

media_title.eng: How does self-care help you and your family?

media_transcript.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems, and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves every day, so we are ready to handle those times well and stay calm. 

When we are calm, we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.media_title: How does self-care help you and your family?
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings, everyone.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems, and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves every day, so we are ready to handle those times well and stay calm. 

When we are calm, we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.

character_1_text.eng: Mama, come and play with me with my dolls!

character_2_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish preparing dinner and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.character_1_text: Mama, come and play with me with my dolls!
rows.character_2_text: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish preparing dinner and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.character_1_text: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish preparing lunch quickly, and then I will come play with you.

character_1_text.eng: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish preparing lunch quickly, and then I will come play with you.

rows.character_1_text: (🤔_thinking_) I am glad I took some time with my child. I feel a bit better and my mind feels clearer already. After dinner, I deserve a cup of tea by myself.

character_1_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I am glad I took some time with my child. I feel a bit better and my mind feels clearer already. After dinner, I deserve a cup of tea by myself.

rows.character_1_text: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot of things to do, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

character_1_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot of things to do, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

rows.text_1_facilitator: @data.characters.f1_mother.name did a few things that can also help us when we are feeling overwhelmed.

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.name did a few things that can also help us when we are feeling overwhelmed.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Have another look at @data.characters.f1_mother.name’s facial expression and thoughts. She is feeling stressed and worried.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Yes, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels stressed and worried about everything happening in her life.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Yes, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels stressed and worried about everything happening in her life.

quiz_2_question.eng: What does @data.characters.f1_mother.name do to manage her stress?

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: Yes, taking a pause helps in stressful moments. Even taking a few deep breaths can help us feel better and respond more calmly. She also praised herself, rewarded herself with a quiet cup of tea, and made a plan to spend time with a friend.

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: Exactly. Play helped @data.characters.f1_mother.name connect with @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name and forget about her worries for a moment.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: That’s right! @data.characters.f1_mother.name recognises she is trying her best in difficult circumstances. She also took a pause, rewarded herself with a quiet cup of tea, and made a plan to spend time with a friend.

quiz_2_feedback_4.eng: Exactly, @data.characters.f1_mother.name creates a moment in the evening to enjoy a cup of tea by herself. Having this moment also helps her to come up with other ways to get support. She also took a pause, praised herself, played with her daughter, and made a plan to spend time with a friend.

quiz_2_feedback_5.eng: Yes, when we isolate ourselves, problems will start to feel even bigger. Reaching out to a friend can help. She also took a pause, praised herself, played with her daughter, and rewarded herself with a quiet cup of tea.

quiz_3_question.eng: How is @data.characters.f1_mother.name feeling when she does something small for herself?

quiz_3_feedback_1.eng: Exactly! She is able to feel calmer for a moment and think more positively.

quiz_3_feedback_2.eng: She may still have the same worries, but she also recognises she is trying her best and others are there to support her.

quiz_3_feedback_3.eng: Have another look. After taking care of herself, she feels more positive and hopeful.

section_1_text.eng: Taking a pause helps us to feel and respond calmer in stressful moments.

section_1_extra_text.eng:
Even taking a few deep breaths makes a big difference. 

By staying calm instead of reacting strongly, you can also prevent a lot of problems!

section_2_text.eng: Take a moment and think of one thing YOU did well recently. Say it aloud if you can: "Well done for …"

section_2_extra_text.eng:
Being a parent can be hard. Praise yourself for trying your best. 

Identify negative thoughts when they start and decide if they are true or helpful. If not, find positive thoughts to replace them with. 

For example, instead of “I am a bad parent” say “I am feeling overwhelmed right now, but I am doing the best I can and I will talk to a friend for support”.

section_3_text.eng: What makes you happy? Find small things that you can do every day to care for yourself.

section_3_extra_text.eng: Doing something you enjoy will give you a short break. It will help you to think more clearly and care better for your family. Caring for yourself is caring for your family!

rows.section_2_extra_text:
Being a parent can be hard. Praise yourself for trying your best. 

Identify negative thoughts when they start and decide if they are true or helpful. If not, find positive thoughts to replace them with. 

For example, instead of “I am a bad parent” say “I am feeling overwhelmed right now, but I am doing the best I can and I will talk to a friend for support”.

rows.section_3_extra_text: Doing something you enjoy will give you a short break. It will help you to think more clearly and care better for your family. Caring for yourself is caring for your family!

rows.text_1_facilitator: Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Whenever you can, pause, praise and reward yourself. And remember to connect with your family and friends - you are not alone.

Care for yourself every day. You matter! 

Your home activity is to take care of yourself.
